description: On linux I was first searching firefox extention, but after this I don't think I need one, its quit intuitive design

Layout Ui/UX is simple and concise. Just what I was looking for as an alt for news in browser. 

No need to search for news on different websites, it's all here. 

Great application! Linux4EVA.
summary: Now, where have you been all my life

description: one of the software i will suggest to all my Linux friends

https://github.com/GetStream/Winds/issues/32
https://github.com/GetStream/Winds/issues/479

Honestly, it's just sad that privacy aware users are left as an afterthought.
summary: Obligatory login. Maintainers tagged issue as Wontfix

description:
Can't see point of creating special account for using application on my computer.
Such thing is acceptable for service not app.
In this case the only reason for loging in somewhere is to monitor user's behavior and interests and collecting that information.
Would not recommend to anybody.
summary: next software that requires you to create account

description: très orienté marketing, peu configurable, l'import des opml est difficile
It's a decent app but not a fan of needing to create an account.
summary: Have to create an account to use

description: just a web browser shell for a website - 1 star!
summary: Makes you create an account on their site

description: Even I sign up and created a account, and everytime I open this app, it keep asking me to input name and password, otherwise I cannot use it! And they dont even have options like 'remember login for next time' or 'keep online always', everytime you need input it letter by letter, really sucks. Otherwise this will be a good app. Ubuntu 19.10

This is a wrapper for a website, but with less functionality. The app failed to remember my login information or position in podcasts. The application also doesn't have easy to use keyboard shortcuts or a way to intuitively arrange your own feeds. It looks nice and if you want to read what GetStream.io wants you to then it works great. I'd recommend using their website over the app though.

its time consuming to delete default subscription, hard to add new RSS feeds, many other things
I tried 2 times to use it and failed.
Hard pass for a service I've never heard of. I'll continue paying for Pocket.
summary: Wants you to create an account

description: Login Is Required Everytime.

I Signed up and into this Wind's Program/Software etc..
Keeps saying my Password is Wrong... Re-tried with -
Letting them provide me with password CODE 5 Times.
With my Email Address = Never got any Replies Back :-(

As much as I would like to try this - being forced to create an account before you can view a "vanilla" state is absurd. There are ways to accomplish personalization without forcing an account that could be sold to third-parties.
It works, need some work, but works as expected ( with a login account )

I installed Winds for its facility of sincronize podcasts through OMPL file. However it crashes, doesn't play some eps and the volume control is only decorative. I rather subscribe to 40 feeds individually than using this app on my desktop.
great software desires a five star!
This app is simply amaizing! I can agregate all the channels and newspapers free of adds from all over the world, is exactly wha I was dreaming of!
unfurtunately this app doesn't want to work ive already registered an account but for some reason its not working, whether thats because its a snap package im not sure.
Don't use. Takes an online account to use and doesn't do a thing. Opens a website and won't run any url. I couldn't get any of the podcasts to play. Useless and suspicious app.
I made a new account and then I got endless loading winds animation icon. Nothing works.
most of the times it gets freezed
no thank you sir
This is not free software, contrary to what is indicated in the Snap store. Flagging so that developers/snap community may fix it.
Latest ubuntui 21.04 and it wont launch. Ive used before now nothing.

I can't say any about the programm because you HAVE TO register to use this programm. You can't skip that. Open Source and free to use software? Nope, not with forced registration. Installed in seconds and uninstalled within seconds.

Unfortunately, Winds is trash even before I had a chance to take a look at its abilities. Contrary to what it says in the software center, this is not free and will not work without a registration. Ridiculous.
I can't use it without registration. Removed.
Il faut s'inscrire et créer un compte pour pouvoir utiliser cette application.

Je suis déçu par cette application car en effet, il est obligatoire de créer un compte pour pouvoir l'utiliser. Mais je me suis aussi rendu compte qu'on était obligé de recevoir des notifications par mails des nouveaux podcasts auquel on est abonné. En plus l'interface n'est pas intuitive : on ne peut pas accéder facilement à nos podcasts favoris.
nécessaire de s'inscrire et bug pour l'inscription. J'ai perdu 30 minutes de mon temps...
Ubuntu 19.10 - не запускается.
Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS всё работает отлично. Новости, видео, поиск - всё работает.
如果每次都要重新登陆和直接打开网页版有什么区别？连基本的推送功能都没有。
summary: 每次退出后都要重新登录
